Springer Nature Submission Guide

1.  Access the Portal: Navigate to the journal's submission portal (e.g., Manuscript Central).
2.  Prepare Your Files: Ensure your files are formatted correctly. Springer often requires a single file submission.
3.  Provide Information: Enter all author details, affiliations, and an abstract.
4.  Confirm Ethics: Complete the ethics and funding disclosures.
5.  Final Review: A submission summary will be generated. Check for any errors before confirming.
